News.headline: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley Game Called Off
News.page_title: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley Game Called Off
News.URL_keywords: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley Game Called Off
News.short_description: Our Vanarama National League fixture v Bromley has been called off after the match officials assessed that the pitch was unsafe in areas.
News.description:
We would like to apologise to all supporters for any inconvenience.

Details of the new date will be announced in due course.

Anyone who has pre-purchased a ticket should contact the ticket office at tickets@daggers.co.uk for details of a refund if they are unable to attend on the rearranged date.
